desc: The Clifton Bridge Shop stocks souvenirs, greeting cards and postcards, as well as gifts and homewares inspired by the built heritage of the Clifton Suspension Bridge and the city of Bristol.

layout.text: The Clifton Bridge Shop is located in the Clifton Suspension Bridge Visitor Centre and stocks a unique selection of souvenirs, cards, gifts, and homewares inspired by the built heritage of the bridge and the city of Bristol.
Every purchase you make helps to support the Clifton Suspension Bridge Visitor Centre. Thank you for shopping with us.
